mapper.select: SELECT X.*,Y.* FROM( SELECT G.g_seq ,G.g_title ,G.g_cont ,G.g_id ,G.g_pw ,CASE WHEN to_char(G.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD')=to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN to_char(G.reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE to_char(G.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') end reg_dt ,G.rnum AS no FROM( SELECT gal.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reg_dt desc) as rnum FROM gallog gal WHERE user_id = #{search_word} AND g_cate = #{search_div} )G WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size}) )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM gallog gal WHERE user_id = #{search_word} AND g_cate = #{search_div} )Y
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallog ( g_seq, user_id, g_id, g_pw, g_title, g_cont, g_cate, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt ) VALUES ( g_seq.nextVal, #{userId}, #{gId}, #{gPw}, #{gTitle}, #{gCont}, #{gCate}, sysdate, #{modId}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT g_seq ,g_title ,g_cont FROM gallog WHERE g_seq = #{gSeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM gallog WHERE user_id LIKE #{userId} ||'%'
